attributes.additional_details:
Another life has been lost at the factory in Kirkby, Liverpool. How many more lives will need to be effected for parliament to take action and close this factory indefinitely

Sonae Indústria's UK plant located at Knowsley, Merseyside, has been the subject of 22 reports of major accidents between 2000-2010, we can now add another to that figure.

CLOSE THIS PLANT!!!!
